price: Indeed, Allah knows all that is unseen of the heavens and earth, and Allah is All-Seeing of what you do.”
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ غَيۡبَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
